description:
A student with a menacing look threatens the gang. There seems to be something wrong with him. Sora offers him his help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kowai Yume Mite mo Hitori ja Nai kara Daiyobu
Scary Dreams Are Okay Because I`m Not Alone
こわい夢みてもひとりじゃないからだいじょぶ
무서운 꿈을 꿔도 혼자가 아니니까 괜찮아
